expanded_text: {name} {emoji} National: {national} {typee_str}: {typee} {ab_str}: {ability} {evo_text} Games data Gender: {gender} Base friendship: {base_friendship} EV yield: {ev_yield} Catch rate: {catch_rate} Growth rate: {growth_rate} Egg groups: {egg_group} Egg cycles: {egg_cycles} About Pokémon Species: {species} Height: {height} Weight: {weight} Name origin: {name_origin} Other lang: {other_lang} Base stats: {base_stats}{legend}
start_message: ⚡️ Zzzt! Ehy. I'm Rotom! My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot. He's teaching me some commands, for now I learned these: /start: you just used it 🙃 /data pokemonname: Get information about that Pokémon /usage: Get current VGC usage on Pokémon Showdown /about: Informations about me 🤩
error1: ⚡️ Zzrrt! My trainer's teaching me many things, but I still can't read in thought. Use this syntax: /data pokemonname ex.: /data Rotom
results: I traveled to 8 regions with my trainer but I have never heard of such a Pokémon 🧐 However, I can find the 3 closest Pokémon to what you told me Here are the results ⚡️
about: ⚡️ Zzt-zzz! Do you want some lore? Well, I'll give you some interesting links ⬇️ 📣 Rotomgram channel My trainer is writing a biography about me on @rotomgram 🌐 GitHub I'm open-source! https://github.com/alessiocelentano/Rotomgram 🙏 Credits @alessiocelentano (bot, data organization, logo) @gianlucatarantino (additional data) pokemondb.net (data) smogon.com (VGC usage) pokemon.com (artworks)
limit: ⚡️⚡️😵⚡️😵 ZZZZZZRTTT 😵⚡️⚡️😵⚡️ Oh Arceus, do you want to drive me crazy? Well don't do it anymore, there are no Pokémon with more than 25 characters in the name
nomatch: Write in a language understandable to humans (and Pokémon)
incomplete_fc_error: ⚠️ERROR⚠️ {}, to add your Friend Code to the group list follow this syntax: /add 1234-5678-9012
fc_error: ⚠️ERROR⚠️ {}, the Friend Code you entered is not valid, make sure it complies with the following syntax: /add 1234-5678-9012
fc_add:
Friend Code correctly added to the group list ✅
{}: {}
fc_update:
Friend code and name updated correctly ✅
{}: {}
new_raid_error: ⚠️ERROR⚠️ {}, to be able to use this command make sure it respects the following syntax: /new PokémonName
not_creator: Only the creator of the Raid can use this button
not_player: Only raid participants can see the password
not_available: ⚠️ERROR⚠️ This command can only be used in groups, add the bot to one of them and make it admin
no_fc: ⚠️ERROR⚠️ {}, you have not registered any Friend Code in this group. To do this, follow the following syntax: /add IlTuoFC
no_fcs: ⚠️ERROR⚠️ No Friend Codes are registered in this group
